title: a player is ddosing me and i have all the messages.
body: please look into this player his name is [REMOVED] he is ddosing me and keeps threating to fry my modem and i would like something done about it i have messages of him sending me my ip and threats.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support about this. Since it's account specific and related to private messages we can't help you here on boards.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
